metadata.apiml.service.description: Zowe System Services is an HTTPS and Websocket server that makes it easy to have secure, powerful web APIs backed by low-level z/OS constructs. It contains services for essential z/OS abilities such as working with files, datasets, and ESMs, but is also extensible by REST and Websocket "Dataservices" which are optionally present in App Framework "Plugins".
metadata.apiml.catalog.tile.description: Zowe System Services is an HTTPS and Websocket server that makes it easy to have secure, powerful web APIs backed by low-level z/OS constructs.
metadata.apiml.catalog.tile.title: Zowe System Services (ZSS)
